website_summaries.verdict: Many of the features of larger microwaves in a less expensive product.
pros: Includes a glass turntable and interior light
cons: This microwave is a lot smaller than others on the market

customer_reviews.title: By at your own risk.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit 4 months ago. It worked great for about 3 1/2 months of that time and then it started making grinding noises coming from within the lower cabinet. If you remove the carousel dish the noise goes away. Tells me that a gear is about to crap out. We will continue to use it till it dies but I definitely would not by it again nor recommend anyone to by it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stormo

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microwave for my Mom. After about two months, the unit caught fire during use. Luckily it did not create a larger kitchen fire. I called to get a replacement (855.855.0294). After being on hold for some time, I was told they would replace it but first I need to cut the plug off the unit, provide a receipt and peel off a label and mail everything to them. Then they would provide a replacement. Guessing the process would take a few weeks so just going to kiss this purchase off as a lost cause and purchase another unit from a local brick & mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave.  Good microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great little microwave - not too loud, 900 watts are enough for us. It has a timer and I missed that in my old microwave. I don't need a lot of settings - we're just heating stuff up. It fits neatly on top of of small kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't have purchased
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a replacement small microwave for my in-law apartment quickly. It is a nice, solid piece with thick sturdy metal frame and it looks good. However, it has no "quick cook" features (I got over this because it is still faster than a stovetop and doesn't heat up the house like an oven) so is sort of a pain to use. The real reason I would not purchase again is because it heats very unevenly. Nachos were burned in some places and completely unmelted in others! And there is a turntable, too! Great to heat up a cup of water, but barely passable for food. If I had any other quick options, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ZooMa68

customer_reviews.title: much smaller than expected, my own fault. Does ...
customer_reviews.text: much smaller than expected, my own fault. Does not have "quick start" function keys, also does not have a STOP button. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Leabo

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the old one in my RV it's the same size and power rating but this works alot better than the old one. I noticed people complaining about the numbers peeling from the panel. There is a protective film it's very thin and kinda tricky to remove but the actual number pad is fine it will not peel away. I just received it I got it used but it was on brand new condition I don't think it's ever been plugged in. I'm very happy with my purchase. I feel like I h Got a better microwave by ordering this vs getting cheapo at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: buzzzlove

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: Very loud. Do not like the way timer works reverting back to clock and I have to hit timer to she how much time is left.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Azadian

customer_reviews.title: Looks & Feels Tinny, Cheap and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering the exact same model I'd had previously. It's not. This one looks tinny and cheap. The push-to-open panel feels flimsy and makes me wonder if it'll fall off some day. Unfortunately, I had it shipped to an alternate address and didn't retrieve and open it til the week after the return window had closed. If only I'd known...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Berrien

customer_reviews.title: It's an Ok little microwave. Lasted 11 months before starting to show signs of failure.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good little microwave. Only lasted 11 months. It just started making a weird noise and the glass tray that spins is now starting to jerk while it spins.
customer_reviews.author: Berneymc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t bake a potato!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars but I’m disappointed in the fact that every time I try to make a baked potato in it, it burns the bottom of the potato! There’s an actual burn mark on the bottom & the potato isn’t even done!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: If you push the door button in about half way, without opening the door. The microwave power will come on. My granddaughter figured this out. I do not understand why the door switch would have anything to do with starting the power on a microwave. Power off sure.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Microwave
customer_reviews.text: It is a great little microwave. I did not want to big one because of counter space and I needed white because of my other appliances. So far there is nothing bad I can say about this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: chk5823

customer_reviews.title: It looked nice but after a few uses began to vibrate and ...
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice but after a few uses began to vibrate and spark. Like a bad rockandroll wannabee. It was quite scary actually. We unhooked it asap and sent it back to its maker. Thank you, Amazon, for having a convenient returns system. Still, it was disappointing and we won't be ordering anything from Westinghouse ever again. Boo! Eamonn Kilmartin
customer_reviews.author: Eamonn M. Kilmartin

customer_reviews.title: Not Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than other similar models, so I expected to sacrifice quality - but it is great. Worth the buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainCraboo

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine. Does what it is supposed too
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine.Does what it is supposed too.Wish it had express buttons.Hit 1 and cook for one minute.II and hit start.I think I am lazy
customer_reviews.author: mphard

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the specs
customer_reviews.text: product was not size listed...it did not add 1" to height for legs...so mad! have to return it and look for another.
customer_reviews.author: STACY

customer_reviews.title: The microwave arrived with a piece missing from the top ...
customer_reviews.text: The microwave arrived with a piece missing from the top of the left side of the door.. Damaged merchandise is not what I wanted to pay for.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn  lentz

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: I only had this microwave for three months, and it died it just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight; easily slides
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but is very light in weight making it slide on the counter easily upon opening & closing the door. Does a fantastic job warming the food.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: died after two years
customer_reviews.text: This microwave worked very well for two years before dying a spectacular death. While reheating some coffee one morning, it starting making awful noises and what looked like lightning started arcing through the thing. Scared the daylight out of me. It's on the way to the landfill now, after two short years of use. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: I have been pleased with this microwave
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with this microwave. I have a small place and the size is just right. I do wish selecting the time was a little easier. Other than that it s a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t even get this to work 😡
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son living away from home, for convenience. Everytime he tried to do anything the start button double bleeped and we couldn’t get any function to work. So frustrated he gave up and purchased something else the same day from Walmart. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Bought on May 7.  Died on Dec 14
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last. Light use. Something shorted inside and it got a char spot on the inner liner. Disposable microwave, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Works Great,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the office. - It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have many options like popcorn, defrost, frozen foods, power, timer, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this, we were having lots of problems. We have to throw every remaining food and that's not good. But, after we received this microwave, it help us alot. It works fine and it has been a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I paid money for this.
customer_reviews.text: Need to press buttons hard for them to function. The plastic is peeling off the front number panel. I have only had this for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: S&S

customer_reviews.title: Broken when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I got it, unboxed it and took all the stickers off, then plugged it in and tried to heat up a sandwich...it started making an arcing/popping sound and for the life of me I can't find out what's causing it. Maybe some sort of electrical arcing in the actual wires?? Regardless, it was broken before I ever got it. I'm returning it and going to buy another of the same type and brand so...I'll update this when the new one comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Cristofer H.

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the product, a little noisy but works well easy to operate and set.
customer_reviews.author: Gary wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice medium sized microwave
customer_reviews.text: Nice medium sized microwave. But there's no control to turn off or turn down the "ding" noise. And it makes that noise a lot. Loudly.
customer_reviews.author: Jock Friar

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Received earlier then expected. Perfect size for my kitchen. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Tara Marzullo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean, it does not have an “add a minute” choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, easy to use, works great, no issues with this at all! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sidell

customer_reviews.title: Good price, design and functions
customer_reviews.text: I love the microwave. Used a lot of the functions . Basic but powerful enough and large inside space. Bought for apartment and like my purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this a year ago and it's already burned out. Do not buy this item, it is cheaply made. My last microwave lasted for a decade. This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: It just plain stopped working after only four months.No more using Amazon to purchase appliances.
customer_reviews.text: The buttons stopped working after only four months. No more Whirlpool branded products for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because,my kitchen is very dark,and it is just the right size
customer_reviews.author: Mary Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement MW fits right into my countertop corner
customer_reviews.author: Mario T

customer_reviews.title: Commercial Chef Microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work and so unable to provide any constructive comments.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 3 months. Don't buy this! It's junk!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, the size is perfect for the kitchen in my apartment, and better power than my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: carla rusconi

customer_reviews.title: Quit working!!
customer_reviews.text: It quit working after only 6 months, don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: CVM

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white one. And it fits well on the top of my refrigerator. I mainly use it to heat my food and drinks, it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend and will not buy another Westinghouse product
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay for 2 months and suddenly no longer heats anything. Would not recommend and will not buy another Westinghouse product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J. Hood

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this microwave. It overcooks the food in the middle and makes the middle hard and not eatable.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Heberle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The is no one touch button to start; you MUST enter the amount of time you require
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carnes

customer_reviews.title: It was a good price thank you
customer_reviews.text: It fits in my hole in The counter good. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: shirley.Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: 😪
customer_reviews.text: Sounded like a freight train going off at the very first use
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter her menu's work this product is rated as poor.
customer_reviews.text: Most of menu on my microwave doesnt work also I bought one for my daughter her menu's work this product is rated as poor. MENU buttons 1,3,7,9 Donot work and Clock doesnt work so I modified the process to use this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES H OWENS

customer_reviews.title: It's fine. Doesn't have quite as many features as the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. Doesn't have quite as many features as the built in one we had to leave behind from our move. We're adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kempees-cook

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The Westinghouse microwave was defective had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine
customer_reviews.text: I like it's size, fits well on my counter top. The clock has a constant display of 'clock' in red that is a bit annoying at first, but I've gotten used to it.
customer_reviews.author: BlownItem

customer_reviews.title: Microwave worked for 2 weeks before one day it just ...
customer_reviews.text: Microwave worked for 2 weeks before one day it just stopped working. You could enter the time and press start button but microwave would never engage or start cooking. Returned through Amazon without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Turntable making grinding noises and jerky
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 4.5 months. Then, without warning, the motor/gear (or whatever) driving the turntable began making loud grinding noises and turntable now moves erratically in a herky-jerky manner. Very annoying and have no clue when this will completely fail. Previous cheaper microwave lasted more than 10 years without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work fine although i neglected to make sure the window was ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work fine although i neglected to make sure the window was white instead of black grid. It odes beep too much. Three short beeps would be fine, but if you do not get to it quick enough it keeps beeping. What if there were someone else sleeping or a baby - it is too much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Susan  M.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price - cooks nice and hot
customer_reviews.text: This model is a brand name version of a microwave I had that wore out after many years. It cooks hotter than the one I had before, and I like the same simple controls. I hope it lasts even longer than my former unit.
customer_reviews.author: John King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what a couple needs. Doesn't take up and huge amount of space and is easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Calilibra805

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right
customer_reviews.text: Fits right in space from old microwave. Great power,. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S. Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Sparks when you hit start. Stopped working after 6-7 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is the weirdest Microwave I've ever bought. This thing sparks intermittently upon hitting the start button. It still worked, so I managed to use it till I could; But after about 6.5 months of use, the microwave doesn't heat anything anymore. It turns on, starts, the plate rotates inside and the light turns on but the food stays as cold as ever. Would definitely NOT recommend. Please be careful everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nomish Bhardwaj

customer_reviews.title: Stronger tha my last one
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and better than my last one, only problem it takes a lot of depth space on my counter top. Is faster and stronger than my last one. Overall good deal
customer_reviews.author: lisa martha

customer_reviews.title: Greatly needed
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using this to melt solid oils for soap making and it meets my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Ledington

customer_reviews.title: Died in 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift in July and not used until August 2018. It died February 2019. I expect it to last longer than 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it for refund
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month the turntable would start to whine so loud it was unbearable to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Skaaf

customer_reviews.title: Beeping noise to loud
customer_reviews.text: The beeping noise is to loud. Every time you push a button the beeping noise is to loud. Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dupes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a year and i have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor heating, limited options for 'quick start'. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. However II made the mistake of only getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. However II made the mistake of only getting a 900 watt. But that is just as well. I have more control now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Jakey

customer_reviews.title: all smooth surfaces makes for easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: A month in and its performing as you`d expect.all smooth surfaces makes for easy clean up. most one touch prep buttons for the usual reheats makes choosing time and heat leaves easy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Costanzo

product_meta.title: Commercial Chef CHM990W 900 Watt Counter Top Microwave Oven, 0.9 Cubic Feet, White Cabinet
product_meta.description: With the Commercial Chef CHMH990W you get all the right features. This countertop microwave delivers 900 watts of power and the quality that the Commercial Chef name is known for. 10 power levels let you cook or reheat a variety of foods just right. The keypad controls give you the option of inputting precise cooking times, and the clear LED display lets you know exactly how much time is left. Six one-touch quick cook buttons for items like popcorn and frozen dinners add to the convenience, and the child safety lock ensures the microwave is not used without supervision. A great addition to any busy family’s kitchen.
feature_bullets: Push button touch controls for simple, worry free operation
Easy-to-read green LED display that includes digital clock and timer. Digital Clock/Timer with Child Safety Lock
10 cooking power levels provide tremendous flexibility and help deliver a quality meal every time
Six one-touch quick cook menu buttons: Popcorn, Potato, Pizza, Beverage, Reheat, Frozen Food
Convenient auto weight and speed defrost make you feel like a professional chef in your kitchen
Push button style door with peace of mind child safety lock
Ideal for singles and couples with limited counter space. Good for preparing small or medium size items.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars173 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
